titles.title: Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River Mongaup Visitor Center Act of 1999
Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River Mongaup Visitor Center Act of 1999
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct and operate a visitor center for the Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River on land owned by the State of New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Referred to National Park Service for comments.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-361.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 204.

action.text: Mr. Sherwood moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 20.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski with an amendment. With written report No. 106-211.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 367.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee amendment was withdrawn by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/2/1999--Reported to Senate amended. Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River Mongaup Visitor Center Act of 1999 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, subject to the availability of appropriations, to: (1) enter into a 99-year lease with the State of New York for State-owned land within the boundaries of the Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River located at an area known as Mongaup near the confluence of the Mongaup and Upper Delaware Rivers in New York; and (2) construct and operate a visitor center on such land.Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to extend the Upper Delaware Citizens Advisory Council for an additional ten years.
